featured.text: Tell me all the truth, (D) I could not help you solve the problem.
A tall tale, in other words, is a story in which the truth has been exaggerated.
The woman told the truth to her lawyer without ____ because he was the only person she could rely on.

definition.zh_def: 真理；事實的狀態或性質。
definition.en_def: The state or quality of being in accordance with fact or reality.
definition.example: She always seeks the truth in every situation.
